CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: On the other hand , the maximum absorption peaks of PCZDTB ( λ max ) were observed at 386 and 514 nm in solution.

Let's think step by step.
1. PCZDTB: This is the name of the material. Therefore, it is the Material Name entity in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: On the other hand , the maximum absorption peaks of PCZDTB ( λ max ) were observed at 386 and 514 nm in solution.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCZDTB

This is the name of the compound whose maximum absorption peaks are being discussed in the paragraph. Therefore, it can be identified as the "Property Name" entity in this context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCZDTB

This is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material and its associated property. Therefore, it is the only relevant "Property Name" entity in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: On the other hand , the maximum absorption peaks of PCZDTB ( λ max ) were observed at 386 and 514 nm in solution.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCZDTB: This is a compound or material name, and it is not a property value entity.
2. λ max: This is a property value representing the maximum absorption wavelength or wavelength of maximum absorption for PCZDTB in solution.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

λ max: 386 nm, 514 nm

These are the entities that clearly refer to the values of material properties (maximum absorption wavelengths) in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| λ max: 386 nm |
| λ max: 514 nm |
